content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ home services. May I please have your name to assist you with your HVAC needs?
Thank you, Frank. Can you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Thanks for that. Just a moment while I confirm that we cover your area.
Good news, Frank! We do service your area. When would be an ideal time for an HVAC technician to come by?
I need someone by Thursday afternoon, preferably after 3 pm.
Checking our schedule for Thursday after 3 pm now.
We have an opening on Thursday at 4 pm. Should I book that slot for your HVAC service?
Yes, please book it. But I want to know if you have any budget-friendly options, my budget's tight.

Thank you for letting me know, Frank. I will book the appointment for Thursday at 4 pm now. Regarding budget-friendly options, our technician can discuss cost-saving tips and options during the visit. I'll confirm your booking now.
Your appointment is booked for Thursday at 4 pm. You will receive a reminder a day before. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Thank you for choosing XYZ!
